creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Loosely drawn table with four cells numbered from one to four; each consist of a different image and comments (see inscriptions) from the artist
inscription:
Various notes inscribed in black crayon and graphite, verso:
[Large / Masterpiece], upper center
[little / girl], LL next to UL cell
[scribe], LR, next to UR cell
[Barbie], LL, next to LL cell
[double / prints (struck-through) / group], LL, next to LL cell
medium: Black crayon, watercolor on foam core
title: Working Sketch for 'Large Masterpiece'
